mapper.select: SELECT MOVIE_NO, MOVIE_NAME, MOVIE_DATE, MOVIE_POSTER_IMAGE, TO_CHAR((SELECT ML_GRADE FROM MOVIE_LIKE WHERE ID=#{ID} AND MOVIE_LIKE_NO=A.MOVIE_NO),'0.0') ML_GRADE, TO_CHAR((SELECT AVG(ML_GRADE) FROM MOVIE_LIKE WHERE MOVIE_LIKE_NO=A.MOVIE_NO),'0.0') AS MOVIE_AVG_GRADE, RNUM FROM ( SELECT MOVIE_NO, MOVIE_NAME, MOVIE_DATE, MOVIE_POSTER_IMAGE, ROWNUM RNUM FROM MOVIE WHERE MOVIE_NO IN (SELECT MOVIE_LIKE_NO FROM MOVIE_LIKE WHERE ID=#{ID} AND ML_GRADE != 0) ORDER BY MOVIE_DATE) A

SELECT DRAMA_NO, DRAMA_NAME, DRAMA_DATE, DRAMA_POSTER_IMAGE, TO_CHAR((SELECT DL_GRADE FROM DRAMA_LIKE WHERE ID=#{ID} AND DRAMA_LIKE_NO=A.DRAMA_NO),'0.0') DL_GRADE, TO_CHAR((SELECT AVG(DL_GRADE) FROM DRAMA_LIKE WHERE DRAMA_LIKE_NO=A.DRAMA_NO),'0.0') AS DRAMA_AVG_GRADE, RNUM FROM ( SELECT DRAMA_NO, DRAMA_NAME, DRAMA_DATE, DRAMA_POSTER_IMAGE, ROWNUM RNUM FROM DRAMA WHERE DRAMA_NO IN (SELECT DRAMA_LIKE_NO FROM DRAMA_LIKE WHERE ID=#{ID} AND DL_GRADE != 0 ) ORDER BY DRAMA_DATE) A

SELECT AD_NO, AD_NAME, AD_POSTER_IMAGE, TO_CHAR((SELECT AL_GRADE FROM AD_LIKE WHERE AL_GRADE != 0 AND ID=#{ID} AND AD_LIKE_NO=A.AD_NO),'0.0') AL_GRADE, TO_CHAR((SELECT AVG(AL_GRADE) FROM AD_LIKE WHERE AL_GRADE != 0 AND AD_LIKE_NO=A.AD_NO),'0.0') AS AD_AVG_GRADE, RNUM FROM ( SELECT AD_NO, AD_NAME, AD_POSTER_IMAGE, ROWNUM RNUM FROM AD WHERE AD_NO IN (SELECT AD_LIKE_NO FROM AD_LIKE WHERE ID=#{ID} AND AL_GRADE != 0 ) ) A
